overview: After her mother passed away, Leny (82) finally had time to follow her dream of cycling around the world. She didnâ€™t get further than New Zealand where she met the love of her life - another woman. Leny came out of the closet aged 68. Since then she has thrown herself into lesbian life, making up for lost time. She is an inspiration to many, but is not getting any younger. She is determined to make the most of her remaining years.
title: Over the Rainbow
